item.title: Shoes moves to the 2nd Generation
item.dc:creator: Victor Goff
item.content:encoded:
On the Shoes ML, _why had implied that he'd take a break.

- it is even harder during the summer. (25 May 2009)
- I've been away for the summer, taking a break from everything. (03 Aug 2009)

But it happened by the sensational way nobody could expect.

- A Cup Full Of Why: 32 Why The Lucky Stiff Links

We all feel sad. But Ruby community is now trying to recover and maintain _why's lifework.

- Decentralization of _why's Projects

Well, Shoes moves to the 2nd Generation. mental and greatseth will conduct us, Shosers.

So, if you'd like to help for Shoes,

- join to the Google Group shoooes
- fork whymirror/shoes on GitHub

Then contribute your code and discuss your ideas.

I guess _why will be back when Shoes evolves into the next step.

Hopefully. ;-)

ashbb
